reviews.review_msg: He add red notes onto his lecture slides that he does not put on the slides on Canvas (online)forcing you to attend his long, dry, and boring lecture to get all the information needed for the exams. Tutorial are next to useless, you are required to do only 1 presentation throughout the semester, yet you still have to attend for attendance grading (5%).
His class is pretty easy with 2 essays, a midterm and a final. The content is easy to grasp and lectures can be boring at times. He has a pretty heavy accent. No textbook needed.
Hard to understand him at times but overall great class.

This class definitely has some interesting topics, but lectures are boring and dry. Prof mostly reads off the lectures slides, with not much additional information on them. Textbook is absolutely useless, no need for it.
